sentences.sContent: She badgered me for weeks until I finally gave in.
sentences.sCn: 她缠了我好几个星期，直到我最终答应了她。

trans.tranCn: 獾；獾皮；（大写）獾州人（美国威斯康星州人的别称）；<动><澳>毛鼻袋熊
trans.tranOther: an animal that has black and white fur, lives in holes in the ground, and is active at night
to try to persuade someone by asking them something several times
